abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Todd Crawford at
            the meeting of June 22, 2000 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy progress report (R2000-102), the
            Structural Adjustment Program (R2000-105) and the Financial
            Sector Technical Assistance Project (R2000-113) for Ecuador.
